lemma SD_inefficient_support': assumes wf: "is_pref_profile R" assumes A: "A \<noteq> {}" "A \<subseteq> alts" and wit: "p \<in> lotteries" "\<forall>i\<in>agents. p \<succeq>[SD(R i)] pmf_of_set A" "i \<in> agents" "\<not>p \<preceq>[SD(R i)] pmf_of_set A" shows "\<exists>x\<in>A. pmf (sds R) x = 0"
